label: ham
subject:
svn commit: samba r22134 - in branches/SAMBA_4_0: .
	source/script/tests
body: And have you further observed, that those who have a natural talent for calculation are generally quick at every other kind of knowledge; and even the dull, if they have had an arithmetical training, although they may derive no other advantage from it, always become much quicker than they would otherwise have been.
